A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Being a huge SW fan\, I was really discouraged after reading all of the negative reviews and went into the theater with low expectations. I don’t know if that helped\, but I really liked this episode. It was far from great\, but hardly as terrible as many have made it out to be. While I agree with some of the negative comments\, it’s my opinion that they are being overly dramatic and blown out of proportion. I also think that people’s expectations might just be unrealistic. If this had been any other movie without the history and expectations of the SW franchise\, I think this would have landed around the 85% mark from users. I encourage anyone who is a true fan to ignore the drama and go enjoy the movie.
